oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Two unidentified girls, one black and one white, seated upon a porch
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rankin, Anne Porterfield, 1887-1941
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For current rights information, please visit: http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001200
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two young girls, one black and one white, are seated together to pose for this picture. While their shoes and stockings are similar, their dresses are distinctively different.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Children.
Girls 1900-1920.
Children and Childhood.
African-Americans.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices, http://idserver.utk.edu/?id=200600000001199
